website_summaries.verdict: A small, attractive crossbody bag that's perfect for consumers who love the designer but don't want to spend a lot of money.
pros: The classic crossbody style is crafted with real leather and has pretty gold-tone hardware
One of the more affordable bags by kate spade
cons: Fairly small, so it's not the best pick for those who like to carry large wallets or lots of items

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with order
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my order. I received the bag before the scheduled delivery date, which was awesome. A new lovely bag with all tags attached. Not a knockoff. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tight Opening - Impractical
customer_reviews.text: The material, look, and feel of the bag are nice, but the design isn’t practical. The opening is narrow so it’s a little awkward reaching in to put something in/take something out. Like I had to really pay attention and open it as wide as I could so as not to scratch my hand with the zipper. I’m used to a small crossbody purse but this wasn’t just a smallness issue. It just felt like to tight of an opening to be practical. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Small Cross Body
customer_reviews.text: Slightly darker and smaller than anticipated. A good neutral color did not come gift wrapped like other KS bags on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Christina K. Treadway

customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! The color looks even more beautiful in person! Unfortunately it was a gift and it came in wrapped so i couldnt take a pic but definitely recommend! That reminds me it did come with tags also it came with an original Kate Spade shopping bag! Cute!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: My Kate Spade Christmas Gift for my Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Kate Spade handbag, It came to me in the mail very well packaged, I was very happy with my Kate Spade handbag, I gave it as a gift to my granddaughter for Christmas, She’s sixteen she loved it, I appreciate the prompt service the buyer gave me as a customer, I am a Happy Customer for this, I say Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: GloBag7

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for crossbody!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it! Great side pocket for my iPhone and color is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: DaphneGrace

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet but looks very nice and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: sofia

customer_reviews.title: Great purse but too small
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag. Wish it was a little bit bigger that’s why I gave it 4 stars instead of five. Even a small wallet makes it hard to zip closed.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: It’s good looking purse.
customer_reviews.text: It’s good quality purse but too small for me I might be good to give as a gift to someone else that would like it more.
customer_reviews.author: ashleystevenson

customer_reviews.title: authentic Kate Spade
customer_reviews.text: it was exactly the size and style purse I was searching for and is an authentic Kate Spade
customer_reviews.author: ang72

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute!!! Nice purse to carry small items and traveling... straps adjustable, love d color
customer_reviews.author: Neera Lakhan

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag was a huge hit with my sisters :) she loves it and the color was a good match to a lot of her wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: MeliAmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Will be nice if the bag is bigger and it will be perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Design is nice and good quality. But the bag is too small for me. Cannot put a lot of things.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Chow

customer_reviews.title: pretty
customer_reviews.text: Its very very comfortable and practical. Its very very useful for shopping!!!
customer_reviews.author: teenager
